title: Case Study-Based Workshop for Improving Student Mental Health and Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific knowledge and understanding of basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Hybrid education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, requiring flexible learning design to accommodate working professionals' time constraints

learning_goals: Learners analyze case studies of students with mental health challenges to propose improvements in learning design
Learners explain methods to create inclusive educational environments using learning design tools
Learners propose at least two mental health support strategies applicable in resource-limited technological settings

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
